clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Bone and Gum Dimension Changes Around Dental Implants Placed in Different Positions in Bone.
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Changes of Hard and Soft Tissues After Epi-crestal and Sub-crestal Placement of Ankylos Dental Implants.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to test two standard of care techniques of placing dental implants, and to compare how people's bones and gums respond to two different depths at which implants are placed.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study is to test epicrestal and subcrestal placement of dental implants, and to compare how people's bones and gums respond to two different depths at which implants are placed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 18 months, 30 months and 66 months after implant placement.
primary_outcome.description: Changes in mid-facial bone levels to be measured by CAT scan.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of interproximal levels after loading.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 18 months, 30 months and 66 months after implant placement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in buccal soft tissue level.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 18 months, 30 months and 66 months after implant placement.
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by CAT scan and clinically from a fixed reference point to the mid buccal soft tissue level using a stent.
